data.actual_result: Scroll bars, artifact in the corner, and "Raging Demon" easter egg gets its own column
data.expected_result: Menu nicely resizes to fit window
data.short_description: Keyboard shortcut window on narrow screens has resizing issues and a white box artefact on dark mode
data.steps_to_repro: - Drag window size to narrow - Open up keyboard shortcuts with Ctrl/Cmd + / -  Observe scroll bars and artifacts
